RelatedSentence: An article saying President Barack Obama has announced plans to run for a third presidential term is fake .
An article saying President Barack Obama has announced plans to run for a third presidential term is fake .
According to a disclaimer , National Report does n't post real news stories .
National Report is a news and political satire web publication , which may or may not use real names , often in semi-real or mostly fictitious ways .
All news articles contained within National Report are fiction , and presumably fake news .
Any resemblance to the truth is purely coincidental , it states .
The satirical article about Obama 's third term had thousands of likes and shares on Facebook .
A number of people apparently believed it .
